Title: Discovery
Plot: Louis and Mike finally see eye to eye, but Louis' paranoia may damage his budding friendship with Mike as well as his standing at the firm. Also, Travis Tanner rolls back into town, gunning for Harvey. Guest Stars: Eric Close, David Costabile, John Finn.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
GuestStars: David Costabile, John Finn, Erika Alexander, Eric Close
